temples.name: Rome Italy Temple
temples.addres: Via di Settebagni 376, Rome RM, Italy
temples.summary: The Rome Italy Temple is the first built in Italy, located on via di Settebagni in municipality III northeast of Rome a short distance from the 'Grande Raccordo Anulare' (Rome Ring Road). temple serve churchgoers in Greece, Cyprus, Albania, Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia-Herzegovina, and Macedonia, as well as the more than 22,000 Italian LDS members.

temples.name: Caracas Venezuela Temple
temples.addres: Avenida. C con Calle C-1, Urb Caurimare Caracas 1062-A, Dependencias Federales Venezuela
temples.summary: The Caracas Temple is one of the temples built and operated by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, the 96th built by the church and the only one in Venezuela, located in the Caurimare urbanization of the city of Caracas, State Miranda. Due to its proximity to the communities, members from Aruba, Suriname, Guyana, Trinidad and Tobago, and the Netherlands Antilles also attend the temple.

temples.name: Bogotá Colombia Temple
temples.addres: Carrera 46 N°127-45, Bogotá Distrito Capital, Colombia
temples.summary: The Temple of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in Bogotá, Colombia, is one of the temples built and operated by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, the 57th in operation by the church, being the first and unique in operations in Colombia until the dedication of the Barranquilla temple. The temple is located in the city of Bogotá, on Carrera 46 with Av. Rodrigo Lara Bonilla.

temples.name: Barranquila Colombia Temple
temples.addres: Carrera 46 via al mar pr 107, Sentido: de Barranquilla a Cartagena, Barranquilla Atlantico, Colombia
temples.summary: The Barranquilla Colombia Temple is one of the temples built and operated by the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, the church's 161st and the second built in Colombia, located in the Caribbean city of Barranquilla. The temple, due to its proximity to the communities, is attended by faithful from Santa Marta, Cartagena, Valledupar, Montería and the coastal area of Barranquilla. Before the construction of the temple in Barranquilla, the faithful of the region traveled to the temple in Bogotá.
